item.title: Cass add a quote by Jeffrey Eugenides
item.description: "Sourmelina's secret (as Aunt Zo put it): 'Lina was one of those women they named the island after." -- Jeffrey Eugenides

item.title: Cass add a quote by Charlotte Brontë
